name: Infrasonic Relay Upgrade
description: The Infrasonic Relay Upgrade grants Prospectors access to Operations locked behind encoded signals. Operations are a variation of traditional Missions that are started in Open Worlds . Upon completing an Operation, Prospectors will be granted Ren ( ) and Exotics / Volatile Exotics for their efforts (rewards vary per Operation and is affected by Open World difficulty). To access Encrypted Signals , Prospectors will need to craft an Encrypted Satellite Upgrade .
